name: Pac-Man: Core Collection (Wakka)
description:
THIS FANGAME IS NOT AFFILIATED WITH NAMCO IN ANY WAY

Pac-Man is back, man!

Pac-Man: Core Collection is a remastering of Pac-Man's iconic arcade games from throughout the ages. A whole new generation of fans will be able to experience these updated and upgraded reimagining's of the classics.  

More to be added soon.
